%TbxPageName_Name_ToolTip%: Input the name for Key Page
%TbxPageUniqueID_ToolTip%: Input the unique ID for Key Page
%TbxSpeedDiceMin_EquipEffect_SpeedMin_To: Input minimum value of speed dice
%TbxSpeedDiceMax_EquipEffect_Speed_ToolT: Input maximum value of speed dice
%BtnBookIcon_ToolTip%: Select icon image for Key Page
%BtnSkin_ToolTip%: Select character skin for Key Page
%Btn_SBResist_ToolTip%: Set resistance for slash stagger damage$1,1$-5,0
%Btn_PBResist_ToolTip%: Set resistance for penetrate stagger damage$1,1$-5,0
%Btn_HBResist_ToolTip%: Set resistance for hit stagger damage$1,1$-5,0
%BookUniqueCards_ToolTip%: Input unique cards that this Key Page can use
%BtnDropBooks_ToolTip%: Input the books that will drop Key Page
StartPlayPoint_ToolTip: Input the count of Light that the enemy will get when beginning
MaxPlayPoint_ToolTip: Input max the count of Light that the enemy can reach
EmotionLevel_ToolTip: Input max the count of emotion level that the enemy can reach
AddedStartDraw: Numbers that enemy will additionally draw
AddedStartDraw_ToolTip: Input the count of cards that the enemy will additionally draw
%BtnEnemySetting_ToolTip%: Input additional values for enemy Key Page (Not necessary)
EditCriticalPage_Error_1: An error occurred in initializing Key Page
